comment._content: This is most likely Malcolm J. Logan, Harvard's quarterback during the era.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo taken at a Harvard football practice session. Numerous Bain Agency photos of this kind have been posted by LOC on Flickr:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2349969548/]

comment._content:
Branddobbe,

Thanks for the possible full identification. At the very least, we will add that he is on the Harvard football team, based on the abbreviation on the photo itself.
